name: Dungeon rogue
description:
One group of people, a fighter, a monk, a healer, and a mage, form a party to venture into deep dungeon in search for a legendary item. One that's said to be able to grant any wish.

Survival skill is important here. No phoenix down, no resurect spell, once you die, there's no reviving you. Can you beat this dungeon and all its inhabitants and strong monsters in order to get to your goal?

This game is made for one game a month challenge.
